place.name: EVEDON
place.gazetteerText: EVEDON, a parish in Sleaford district, Lincoln; near the Sleaford canal, 2¾ miles NE of Sleaford town and r. station. Post town, Sleaford. Acres, 1, 333. Real property, £2, 157. Pop., 62. Houses, 15. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Lincoln. Value, £300.* Patron, the Earl of Winchelsea. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
